definitions.definition: of or resembling glass in some way, in particular.
having the physical properties of glass; vitreous.

examples: smooth, mirrorlike, gleaming, shiny, glossy, polished, vitreous; Moreslippery, icy; clear, transparent, translucent; calm, still, flat "the glassy surface of the lake"Moreslippery, icy; clear, transparent, translucent; calm, still, flat the glassy surface of the lake

definitions.definition: (of sound) resembling the sharp or ringing noise made when glass is struck.
(of a person's eyes or expression) showing no interest or animation; dull and glazed.
examples: expressionless, glazed, blank, vacant, fixed, motionless; Moreemotionless, impassive, lifeless, wooden, vacuous "a glassy stare"Moreemotionless, impassive, lifeless, wooden, vacuous a glassy stare
